rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: [i]Late in the crisis, all that remained of the Weft were tenuous routes through a sea of unstable glitchlands.[/i]
